ISSUE.TITLE: Docs reference an Eclipse update site that does not exist
ISSUE.DESCRIPTION: Under the [Eclipse Designer section](http://www.flowable.org/docs/userguide/index.html#flowableDesigner), the docs reference http://flowable.org/designer/update/ as the Eclipse update site, but that does not yet exist. The screenshot still has the old Activiti Designer update site, however.

COMMIT.MESSAGE: Merge pull request #6 from VeridianDynamics/inuits-6.4.0 Check user ID for duplicates before attempting user creation
